key_metrics: Revenue for Q1 2025 was $90,234 million, a 12% increase year-over-year from Q1 2024's $80,539 million.
Net income increased by 46% from $23,662 million in Q1 2024 to $34,540 million in Q1 2025.
Diluted EPS rose from $1.89 in Q1 2024 to $2.81 in Q1 2025, marking a 49% increase.
Total costs and expenses increased by 8% from $55,067 million in Q1 2024 to $59,628 million in Q1 2025.
Income from operations grew by 20%, reaching $30,606 million in Q1 2025, up from $25,472 million in Q1 2024.
Other income (expense), net increased significantly, by 293%, from $2,843 million to $11,183 million.
Income before income taxes went up by 48%, from $28,315 million to $41,789 million.
Provision for income taxes increased by 56% from $4,653 million to $7,249 million.
